message: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I stand before you as P4, having navigated through seven intense rounds to reach this final moment. Throughout this game, I have demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and a commitment to fair play. I believe I have earned your respect and trust. In contrast, P3 has shown inconsistency and at times, a disregard for the alliances and agreements made. I ask you to consider my dedication and integrity. "Esteemed jury, I played with integrity and strategy, forming genuine bonds that got me here. I navigated every vote thoughtfully, respecting each of you and this game. P4, while strong, prioritized self-interest over loyalty—ask yourselves who truly valued alliances. I deserve to win because I remained consistent, trustworthy, and fought honorably. Vote to crown a winner who embodies respect, not just survival. Thank you."
